 32 -def _copy_doc(func): 

 33      """ 
 34      Copy docstring 
 35   
 36      :Parameters: 
 37        `func` : ``callable`` 
 38          The method's function 
 39      """ 
 40      from tdi import factory as _factory 
 41      method = getattr(_factory.Factory, func.__name__, None) 
 42      if method is not None: 
 43          func.__doc__ = method.__doc__
